question:
####[NISEI](http://nisei.net) [Downfall Release Notes](http://nisei.net/products/Downfall/DFReleaseNotes#QandAforDownfall) [NISEI Rules Team]
What happens if Loki gains Loot Box’s subroutines and they resolve?
answer: With the recent changes to self-reference templating, “this ice” refers to Loki and Loki will trash itself when the subroutines resolve.
